name: Untitled Boss Fight Game
description:
UBFG is a simple game where you must kill the boss to win. The boss will make patterns appear on the floor, and after a few seconds they turn red. Touching anything red will kill you.

WASD to move

Space to shoot (wait for charge)

Some assets are owned by ID software in DOOM 1 and DOOM 2

Update 1:

  • New Boss Music
  • Health Bar
  • Quicker Attack Charge
  • Screen Shake
  • Timer
  • Recoil
  • Smoother Projectile Spin
  • Explosions
  • Smaller + More Minions
